p: In this study, β-caryophyllene concentration ranges in the EO fractions were 8.3–37.7% and 5.4–12.8% in the nonground and ground materials, respectively ( Supplementary Tables S2 and S3). Its highest concentration was found in the 80–120 min DT fraction of the nonground material ( Supplementary Table S2, Table 3). Its concentration generally increased in later DT fractions ( Table 3).
